      • getOrCreateVirtualFile

        @Deprecated
public static com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile getOrCreateVirtualFile​(@NotNull
                                                                          jetbrains.mps.vfs.IFile file)
        Deprecated.
        It is hack due to the 3.4 release coming soon. We have to use idea vfs to comply with IDEA subsystems which require VirtualFile (e.g. idea indexing/find usages) AP: I hope that it will go away in the nearest future since we do not need vfs tracking these files' physical changes (we would rather make them read-only)

      • toIFile

        @Nullable
@Deprecated
public static jetbrains.mps.vfs.IFile toIFile​(@NotNull
                                              com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile f)
        Deprecated.
        Prefer IdeaFileSystem.fromVirtualFile(VirtualFile) instead. This method relies on global FS singleton.
        Returns:
        null if current fs is not idea-based (it is very unlikely but still)

      • toFile

        public static File toFile​(com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile f)

                                                   org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.util.ProgressMonitor progressMonitor)

      • isFileEventFromMPS

        public static boolean isFileEventFromMPS​(com.intellij.openapi.vfs.newvfs.events.VFileEvent event)
        Allows to distinguish file events from MPS code and from IDEA platform code We don't process events on file updates from MPS, eg writing files after make
        Returns:
        true - event is from IdeaFile processing, false - event from refresh or any other VirtualFile changes
